title: Bug 41707Exception causes Members view to become empty
description: I am running Eclipse GTKI20030813 on Red Hat 9.0. I will attach the log file.
OB: Bug 41707Exception causes Members view to become empty Occasionaly when I switch between editors, I get an exception and the Membersview no longer shows any contents even when different Java files are selected.Closing and opening the Members view fixes the problem.
